summary: An email from an unidentified sender to an unidentified recipient requesting that Jeffrey Epstein's Austrian passport be brought to court the following day for inspection by his attorneys, with a note to discuss any chain of custody issues.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email; his Austrian passport is requested for inspection by his attorneys in court.

events.title: Court date for passport inspection
events.description: A scheduled court proceeding where Jeffrey Epstein's attorneys were to inspect his Austrian passport.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein possessed an Austrian passport, which was subject to legal inspection.
The email was sent on July 18, 2019, regarding a court proceeding scheduled for the next day.
The request highlights concerns about the chain of custody for the passport as evidence.
